name: Dial-a-Friend Online Trivia | Word Play | 10 Questions

questions.text: On the cell phone ABC = 2, DEF = 3, GHI = 4, JKL = 5, MNO = 6, PQRS = 7, TUV = 8 and WXYZ = 9. 1 and 0 will not be used. The first name is a boy's name and his number is 227-2426. What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Abraham.

	Abraham is a Biblical name, that is, it can be found in the Bible. It is a Hebrew name that means "father of many".

questions.text: On the cell phone ABC = 2, DEF = 3, GHI = 4, JKL = 5, MNO = 6, PQRS = 7, TUV = 8 and WXYZ = 9. 1 and 0 will not be used. The next name is a girl's name: 224-4245. What is her name?
questions.explanation:
Abigail.

	Abigail can also be found in the Bible.  It is a Hebrew name meaning "my father's joy".

questions.text: On the cell phone ABC = 2, DEF = 3, GHI = 4, JKL = 5, MNO = 6, PQRS = 7, TUV = 8 and WXYZ = 9. 1 and 0 will not be used. The next name is a boy's name: 272-6366. What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Brandon.

	The name Brandon originally was a surname. The name means "broom".

questions.text: On the cell phone ABC = 2, DEF = 3, GHI = 4, JKL = 5, MNO = 6, PQRS = 7, TUV = 8 and WXYZ = 9. 1 and 0 will not be used. The next name is a girl's name: 226-3423. What is her name?
questions.explanation:
Candice.

	The name Candice has its roots in Latin. In most cases the name means "shining" or "sparkling" .

questions.text: On the cell phone ABC = 2, DEF = 3, GHI = 4, JKL = 5, MNO = 6, PQRS = 7, TUV = 8 and WXYZ = 9. 1 and 0 will not be used. This time it's a boys name: 327-6355. What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Darnell.

	Darnell is an Anglo-Saxon name. Darnell Williams is an actor.

questions.text: On the cell phone ABC = 2, DEF = 3, GHI = 4, JKL = 5, MNO = 6, PQRS = 7, TUV = 8 and WXYZ = 9. 1 and 0 will not be used. The next name is a girl's name: 378-3553. What is her name?
questions.explanation:
Estelle.

	Estelle means "star". Estelle Getty was a famous Estelle, best known for her role as Sophia Petrillo on "Golden Girls".

questions.text: On the cell phone ABC = 2, DEF = 3, GHI = 4, JKL = 5, MNO = 6, PQRS = 7, TUV = 8 and WXYZ = 9. 1 and 0 will not be used. This time it's a boy's name again: 367-7378. What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Forrest.

	Forrest is a Germanic name. When most people hear the name they probably think of "Forrest Gump" but there were also many real people with that name, such as Forrest Smith who was a governor of Missouri.

questions.text: On the cell phone ABC = 2, DEF = 3, GHI = 4, JKL = 5, MNO = 6, PQRS = 7, TUV = 8 and WXYZ = 9. 1 and 0 will not be used. This time it's a girl's name: 499-6384. What is her name?
questions.explanation:
Gwyneth.

	Gwyneth is a Welsh name that means blessed or happy. The most famous Gwyneth of our time is Gwyneth Paltrow who is a famous actress.

questions.text: On the cell phone ABC = 2, DEF = 3, GHI = 4, JKL = 5, MNO = 6, PQRS = 7, TUV = 8 and WXYZ = 9. 1 and 0 will not be used. This time it's a boy's name: 474-6235. What is his name?
questions.explanation:
Ishmael.

	Ishmael is a Biblical name as he was one of Abraham's two children. The name means "God hears".

questions.text: On the cell phone ABC = 2, DEF = 3, GHI = 4, JKL = 5, MNO = 6, PQRS = 7, TUV = 8 and WXYZ = 9. 1 and 0 will not be used. We end with a girl's name: 526-8279. What is her name?
questions.explanation:
January.

	January, which comes from the first month of the year in the Gregorian calendar, comes from Janus, the two faced God in Roman mythology.
